appPath.description: The path (relative to dir) to the electron app to run relative to the project directory

args.description: Arguments to pass through to the launched Electron application

dir.description: The path to the electron forge project to run

enableLogging.description: Enables advanced internal Electron debug calls

inspect.description: Enables the node inspector, you can connect to this from chrome://inspect

inspectBrk.description: Enables the node inspector, you can connect to this from chrome://inspect Pauses the execution on first JavaScript line until debugger connects

interactive.description: Whether to use sensible defaults or prompt the user visually

runAsNode.description: Runs the Electron process as if it were node, disables all Electron API's
